title: #232 - How to Hold Your Own In Conversations You Know Nothing About
itunes:title: #232 - How to Hold Your Own In Conversations You Know Nothing About
itunes:subtitle: This is a special, unique little episode because I am not alone. My sister, Hannah, recorded this little bonus episode with me to give some fun and levity but also permission to be who you are in a room even when you don’t know what everyone is talking...
description:
This is a special, unique little episode because I am not alone. My sister, Hannah, recorded this little bonus episode with me to give some fun and levity but also permission to be who you are in a room even when you don’t know what everyone is talking about.



Helpful Companion Links

  • Get a new episode of The Lazy Sisters every month on Patreon.



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
itunes:summary:
This is a special, unique little episode because I am not alone. My sister, Hannah, recorded this little bonus episode with me to give some fun and levity but also permission to be who you are in a room even when you don’t know what everyone is talking about.
